javadoc:
This class stores values pulled from the
 PROGRAM, INFO_SOURCE, and LANGUAGE tag inside a ghidra program XML file.
 
 Please see PROGRAM.DTD

methods.javadoc: whether the XmlMgr should process stack frames and references.
methods.name: shouldProcessStack
methods.comment: whether the XmlMgr should process stack frames and references.

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if the tool was IDA-PRO.
@return true if the tool was IDA-PRO
methods.name: isIdaPro
methods.comment: Returns true if the tool was IDA-PRO.

return.comment: true if the tool was IDA-PRO

methods.javadoc:
Returns tool field.  This is the name of the tool exactly as written in the XML being imported.
@return tool field
methods.name: getTool
methods.comment: Returns tool field.  This is the name of the tool exactly as written in the XML being imported.

methods.javadoc:
Sets tool field.
 Also sets normalizedExternalToolName to normalized tool names "IDA-PRO" or "GHIDRA" if appropriate, or just sets it to the value of tool.
methods.name: setTool
methods.comment:
Sets tool field.
 Also sets normalizedExternalToolName to normalized tool names "IDA-PRO" or "GHIDRA" if appropriate, or just sets it to the value of tool.

methods.javadoc:
Returns normalizedExternalToolName field.  This is the name of the tool normalized into known categories ("IDA-PRO" or "GHIDRA") if appropriate.
@return normalizedExternalToolName
methods.name: getNormalizedExternalToolName
methods.comment: Returns normalizedExternalToolName field.  This is the name of the tool normalized into known categories ("IDA-PRO" or "GHIDRA") if appropriate.

name: ProgramInfo
comment:
This class stores values pulled from the
 PROGRAM, INFO_SOURCE, and LANGUAGE tag inside a ghidra program XML file.
 
 Please see PROGRAM.DTD

fields.javadoc: The family name of the program's processor (eg, "Intel").
fields.name: family
fields.comment: The family name of the program's processor (eg, "Intel").

fields.javadoc: The preferred name of the Program when loaded back into Ghidra.
fields.name: programName
fields.comment: The preferred name of the Program when loaded back into Ghidra.

fields.javadoc: The timestamp of when the XML file was created.
fields.name: timestamp
fields.comment: The timestamp of when the XML file was created.

fields.javadoc: The ID of the user that created the XML file.
fields.name: user
fields.comment: The ID of the user that created the XML file.

fields.javadoc: The tool that generated the XML file (eg, "Ghidra", etc.).
fields.name: tool
fields.comment: The tool that generated the XML file (eg, "Ghidra", etc.).

fields.javadoc: This is the name of the tool normalized into known categories ("IDA-PRO" or "GHIDRA") if appropriate.
fields.name: normalizedExternalToolName
fields.comment: This is the name of the tool normalized into known categories ("IDA-PRO" or "GHIDRA") if appropriate.

fields.javadoc: The size of the addressing (eg, "32 bit"). @deprecated since version 2.1.
fields.name: addressModel
fields.comment: The size of the addressing (eg, "32 bit"). @deprecated since version 2.1.

fields.javadoc: The absolute path of where the original executable was imported.
fields.name: exePath
fields.comment: The absolute path of where the original executable was imported.

fields.javadoc: The format of the original executable (eg, PE or ELF).
fields.name: exeFormat
fields.comment: The format of the original executable (eg, PE or ELF).

fields.javadoc: The image base of the program.
fields.name: imageBase
fields.comment: The image base of the program.
